General.Name: Vortex Metals Inc.
General.Description: Vortex Metals Inc. engages in the exploration of copper-gold properties in Mexico. The company's flagship properties include the Zaachila copper-gold project that covers an area of 3,264 hectares located in the Southern Oaxaca, Mexico. It also holds 100% interests in two copper-gold volcanogenic massive sulfide properties, including the Riqueza Marina copper-gold project covering an area of 15,308 hectares located in southern Oaxaca, Mexico. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 120 Adelaide Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 1T1
